location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to John Beaumont and George Green, Factors at Bushire from William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham at Bussora (Basra)

mods.abstract: Letter states that messages for Carim Caun [Karim Khan], Mirza Jaffier and Sadoo Caun [Sadiq Khan] are enclosed and requests for them to be translated into Persian and forwarded to Schiras [Shiraz]. The messages are not contained in the file.
